properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Bwana Mungu upokee
vipaji vyetu,
kazi ya mikono yetu
wanadamu). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mkate twakutolea baba,
divai tunaleta upokee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pokea sadaka ya Mwanao,
uliyopenda kutulizwa nayo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ni sadaka ya Mwanao mpenzi,
sadaka ya Mwanao Yesu Kristu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Pia na mazao yetu Baba,
kazi ya mikono yetu pokea.
